items.sentence: Tom is usually the last one to leave the classroom.
Tom is even busier this year than he was last year.
I knew that something terrible was about to happen.
In my opinion, we've already done more than enough.
This year's rainy season is going to be a long one.
Tom was using a laser pointer to play with his cat.
I'm a little hesitant about asking Tom for a favor.
Frankly speaking, Tom's speeches are always boring.
As soon as Tom heard the news, he burst into tears.
I wonder whether or not Tom knows where Mary lives.
